Key Match Events: Philadelphia 76ers scored 123 points against Brooklyn Nets
Joel Embiid scored 17 points in the first half
Pre-Game Insights: Brooklyn Nets were missing Cam Thomas, Cam Johnson, and Ben Simmons due to injuries
Jordi Fernandez had to rely on Tosan Evbuomwan and Reece Beekman due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: D'Angelo Russell left the game with a right shin contusion
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tosan Evbuomwan made his NBA debut
Others: Brooklyn Nets conceded 32 points off 22 turnovers
The Nets did not have a single scorer over the 20-point threshold
